Dec		Hex				Binary

8		8		2^3		1000
15		F		(2^4) -1	1111


128		80		2^7		10000000
255		FF		(2^8) -1	11111111


32768		8000		2^15		1000000000000000
65535		FFFF		(2^16) -1	1111111111111111


8388608		800000		2^23		100000000000000000000000
16777215	FFFFFF		(2^24) âˆ’1	111111111111111111111111


2147483648	80000000	2^31		10000000000000000000000000000000
4294967295	FFFFFFFF	(2^32) -1	11111111111111111111111111111111
